name: Han Seeker (V)
Lore: 'Military version of a ''remote''. Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy to an unoccupied site. Deploys and moves like an Undercover spy. If present with [Permanent Weapon] Han or a smuggler of ability < 3, this weapon and that character are lost (''all cards'' situation).(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
